short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pomodoro is a popular technique for boosting productivity by focusing on only one task for the set time period (25 minutes)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: We believe  that using the Pomodoro technique using our extension Pomodorofy, you can improve your focus & productivity and build things meaningful to you.
